title: Unattended Ground Sensor Planning
description: An intelligence officer must plan the placement of unattended ground sensors (UGS) to monitor a key trail used by insurgents.

tasks.description: Analyze imagery and maps of the area to identify the best locations to place the sensors (e.g., chokepoints, concealed positions).
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer selects optimal locations for sensor placement.

tasks.description: Select the right type of UGS for the mission (e.g., seismic, acoustic, infrared).
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer chooses a mix of seismic and infrared sensors for best results.

tasks.description: Create a mission plan for a Special Forces team to infiltrate the area and emplace the sensors.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer creates a detailed and actionable plan for the emplacement team.
